duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Medicaid Administrative Claiming (MAC) / Random Moment Time Study (RMTS) Operations Team within the School-Based Services (SBS) Center of Excellence (COE).

Maintenance of the PCG Claiming System, Staff Pool List / Calendar/ Shift Preparation, Collection and Review, RMTS Sample Preparation, Quarterly Financial Preparation, Claim Calculation, Quality Assurance, District Follow-Up, Recording District Responses, Data Analysis, and Other Operational Support.
Play an active role in a wide range of work assignments around the successful completion of the RMTS and MAC claim functions from start to finish.
Support customer service and operations for districts, Prepare and open quarters in the PCG Claiming System for districts to update Staff Pool Lists (SPLs), Calendars, and Shifts.
Compile and analyze RMTS data throughout the quarter and at the end of the quarter related to RMTS Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) (working moments, 85%, reimbursable percentages, etc.)
Participate in and/or conduct training for districts on MAC / RMTS program components.
Assist with updating and maintaining Standard Operating Procedure documentation.
Perform user acceptance testing on bug fixes and/or newly released features and software applications.

skills.skill: Medicaid Administrative Claiming (MAC) / Random Moment Time Study (RMTS)
